home.title: Welcome, Rating!
home.subtitle: Introduction
home.description: Enterprises intangible Risk Management via Economic models based on simulation of modern cyber attacks (Hermeneut) is a Horizon 2020 research and innovation project focusing on economics of cyber security.Cyber-attacks can harm intangible assets like reputation, Intellectual Property Rights, expertise, and know-how. There is a great disparity between the efficiency of attacks and inadequate defences, partly due to the lack of quantitative information for decision makers to prioritise security investments. Fostering a culture of risk management, Hermeneut provides individual organisations as well as business sectors with an innovative methodology to assess their vulnerabilities and corresponding tangible and intangible assets at risk.
